user_prompt: Sort the numbers 4, 1, 3 in ascending order and return them comma-separated with no spaces.

Give the union of the sets [1, 2] and [2, 3, 4] as a comma-separated list with no spaces, sorted ascending.

Remove duplicates and sort the words lime, lime, pear, fig in alphabetical order. Return them comma-separated with no spaces.
